content: materials purl soho s paintbrush mohair 1 75% kid mohair and 25% peruvian pima cotton each ball of this worsted/aran- to chunky/bulky-weight yarn is 120 yards/ 50 grams solid version - color a 1 ball approximately 30 total yards required half + half version - color a bottom 1 ball approximately 15 total yards required - color b top 1 ball approximately 15 total yards required center stripe version - color a center stripe 1 ball approximately 15 total yards required - color b top/bottom 1 ball approximately 20 total yards required one ball of paintbrush mohair is enough yarn to make 4 solid ornaments two balls is enough for 8 solid ornaments 8 half + half ornaments or 6 center stripe ornaments you ll also need - a set of us 6 4 mm double pointed needles 2 or us 6 32-inch circular knitting needles 3 for magic loop see notes - a stitch marker 4 or scrap yarn - a us e 3 5 mm or f 3 75 mm crochet hook 5 - poly-fil stuffing 6 for our samples we used the following colors… solid version - wild guava lime fizz orange nectar heirloom white fresh honeydew super pink apple blossom wild strawberry parakeet green lawn green fresh grapefruit giant sequoia half + half version - color a wild guava color b parakeet green - color a super pink color b giant sequoia - color a fresh honeydew color b orange nectar center stripe version - color a lawn green color b apple blossom - color a fresh grapefruit color b fresh honeydew - color a heirloom white color b lime fizz gauge 20 stitches and 28 rounds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch size finished dimensions unstuffed approximately 3 inches diameter finished dimensions stuffed approximately 4 inches diameter pattern designed and written by purl soho designer hiromi glover 7 see even more of hiromi s work on her instagram 8 1 https //www purlsoho com/paintbrush-mohair html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--double_pointed_needles html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles html 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=964 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--crochet_hooks html 6 https //www purlsoho com/ploy-fil-stuffing-three-ounce html 7 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/hiromi-glover-for-purl-soho/ 8 https //www instagram com/mignonnegrise/
